front.title: Medium Repeating Blaster Cannon
front.gametext: Deploy on a site. May be moved by two warriors for 1 additional Force. Your warrior present may target up to two characters or two creatures at same or adjacent site using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Target(s) hit if total destiny > total defense value.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Mark II repeating blaster. Accepts power cells from a very wide variety of sources, a benefit for Rebels accustomed to scavenging for supplies.

rulings: Moving this cannon does not permit those carrying it to make an extra move.
Normal movement costs apply to the characters moving this cannon.
The characters moving this cannon move with it, using landspeed, simultaneously.
